note.p: Death: Hart Street, Bloomsbury, London (04 July 1780)
Burial: Burial-ground of St George, Bloomsbury, London
Education: AB (1753) AM (1756) Corpus Christi College, Oxford; MD (1763, Leyden); MD (Oxford)
Career: Radcliffe Travelling Fellow; settled in Exeter, then Plymouth
References: A D Atkinson, 'Dr Johnson and the Royal Society' in NR 1953 vol 10 pp 131-138
